MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Clarkston Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 9:14PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further works required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:47PM on 14 December 2020.
